title: INFO message is confusing
body:
### Describe the bug

I get the following info message when building my code:
```posh
[INFO] [io.quarkus.arc.processor.Types] Producer method io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.dsl.MixedOperation<com.redhat.agogos.v1alpha1.Component, com.redhat.agogos.v1alpha1.ComponentList, io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.dsl.Resource<com.redhat.agogos.v1alpha1.Component>> components() contains a parameterized typed with a wildcard. This type is not a legal bean type according to CDI specification and will be ignored during bean resolution.
```
And here is methods that seems to be causing hte message to be generated:
```java
    @Override
    @Produces
    public MixedOperation<Component, ComponentList, Resource<Component>> components() {
        return kubernetesClient.resources(Component.class, ComponentList.class);
    }
```
Finally, here is the Component declaration:
```java
@ToString
@RegisterForReflection
@Kind("Component")
@Group("agogos.redhat.com")
@Version("v1alpha1")
public class Component extends AgogosResource<ComponentSpec, Status> implements Namespaced {
```

### Expected behavior

I'd like to be able to resolve whatever issue the messages is indicating. It is not clear how to do that.

### Actual behavior

I can resolve the issue so the message no longer appears.

### How to Reproduce?

The repository is internal to Red Hat:

https://gitlab.cee.redhat.com/agogos/agogos

Build with:
```
./mvnw clean package -DskipTests
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux localhost.localdomain 5.19.13-200.fc36.x86_64 #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Tue Oct 4 15:42:43 UTC 2022 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk 11.0.16.1 2022-08-12 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (Red_Hat-11.0.16.1.1-1.fc36) (build 11.0.16.1+1) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (Red_Hat-11.0.16.1.1-1.fc36) (build 11.0.16.1+1, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.2 (ea98e05a04480131370aa0c110b8c54cf726c06f) Maven home: /home/gallen/.m2/wrapper/dists/apache-maven-3.8.2-bin/1um3pu5poco57pibs3g92d6vrf/apache-maven-3.8.2 Java version: 11.0.16.1, vendor: Red Hat, Inc., runtime: /usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-11.0.16.1.1-1.fc36.x86_64 Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "linux", version: "5.19.13-200.fc36.x86_64", arch: "amd64", family: "unix"

### Additional information

N/A
